sentences.en: Are you going home for Thanksgiving?
sentences.cn: 你回家过感恩节吗？

sentences.en: As she puts it, “We do see each other for Thanksgiving and some meals.
sentences.cn: 如她所解释的那样，“我们在感恩节和一些餐会上见面”。

sentences.en: He heard her trembling voice uplifted in thanksgiving, and praise God.
sentences.cn: 他听得她提高了颤抖的音调,在感谢赞美上帝.

sentences.en: He said sometimes they would invite some friends to share the happiness of Thanksgiving Day.
sentences.cn: 他说有时候他们也会邀请一些朋友来一起分享感恩节快乐。

sentences.en: I ate a big Thanksgiving dinner, and now my tummy hurts.
sentences.cn: 我饱吃了一顿感恩节正餐, 现在胃疼.

sentences.en: I hear about these people every Thanksgiving, then never think about them again for the next 364 days.
sentences.cn: 我在每个感恩节都听说过这群人，而后在接下来的364天，就再也没有想起过他们。

sentences.en: I wonder why turkey seems to belong to Thanksgiving?
sentences.cn: 我纳闷为什么火鸡总是和感恩节连在一起 呢 ?

sentences.en: It compares with "Cyber Monday" in the US - the day after Thanksgiving marketed as a big online shopping day.
sentences.cn: 它与“网络星期一”在美国，感恩节后的第一天销售作为一个大型网上购物一天。

sentences.en: It's going to be the most magnificent Thanksgiving dinner we ever had.
sentences.cn: 这将是我们参加过的最盛大的感恩节晚餐。

sentences.en: It's traditional to eat turkey at Thanksgiving.
sentences.cn: 感恩节吃火鸡是传统.

sentences.en: No matter where his business took him, he always managed to be home for Thanksgiving.
sentences.cn: 不管因生意关系去了什么地方，他总要赶回家过感恩节。

sentences.en: She and the Molinas are going to spend Thanksgiving with their cousins.
sentences.cn: 她和Molinas一家人准备与亲戚一起过感恩节.

sentences.en: She will go home to take part in the Thanksgiving dinner this weekend.
sentences.cn: 周末她要回家参加感恩节餐会.

sentences.en: So, just before Thanksgiving, Carvin set off on a DNA - induced family reunion.
sentences.cn: 为此, 在感恩节前, 卡文奔赴由DNA推出的家族聚会.

sentences.en: Such treaties begin with, but soon go far beyond, the jolly exchange of pie at Thanksgiving for cake on birthdays.
sentences.cn: 这样的协议一开始，就广泛的流传开来，为了生日时的蛋糕在感恩节交换派的快乐。

sentences.en: Thanksgiving Day is usually on the last Thursday in November.
sentences.cn: 感恩节通常在十一月最后的星期四.

sentences.en: That we all have Thanksgiving dinner together?
sentences.cn: 我们会一起用感恩节晚餐吗？

sentences.en: The Colonel bowed his head and whispered a prayer of thanksgiving.
sentences.cn: 这位上校低头轻声做感恩祈祷。

sentences.en: The orthodox Thanksgiving dinner includes turkey and pumpkin pie.
sentences.cn: 传统的感恩节晚餐包括火鸡和南瓜馅饼.

sentences.en: The Prince's unexpected recovery was celebrated with a thanksgiving service in St Paul's.
sentences.cn: 人们在圣保罗大教堂为王子的意外康复举行了感恩祈祷仪式。

sentences.en: They offered a thanksgiving to God for their escape from the shipwreck.
sentences.cn: 他们因从海难中得以生还向上帝作了感恩祈祷.

sentences.en: We always eat turkey on Thanksgiving.
sentences.cn: 我们过感恩节时总是吃火鸡。

trans.tran_cn: （常小写）（对神的）感谢，感恩祈祷，感恩节
trans.tran_en: a public holiday in the US and in Canada when families have a large meal together to celebrate and be thankful for food, health, families etc
a public holiday in the US and in Canada when families have a large meal together to celebrate and be thankful for food, health, families etc
